verbose_text: Addition of La 2 O 3 NPs to the reaction medium accounted for the rapid decline in the absorption intensity at 400 nm simultaneously accompanied by the appearance of a relatively wider band at 298 nm indicating the formation of 4-AP [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and 4-NP was completely reduced 4-AP within the 30 min of the reaction.
